unnormalised: **New Wheels Hitting Indian Roads Faster Than Auto Rickshaws in Mumbai!**
normalised: New Wheels Hitting Indian Roads Faster Than Auto Rickshaws in Mumbai!

unnormalised: Buckle up, folks! The automotive scene in India is hotter than a plate of biryani in Hyderabad. We've got launches galore this month!
normalised: Buckle up, folks! The automotive scene in India is hotter than a plate of biryani in Hyderabad. We've got launches galore this month!

unnormalised: First up, Dr. Reddy's Automotive unveiled their new electric scooter, the 'Bijli Bullet', boasting a whopping 150 km range on a single charge. Talk about escaping Bangalore traffic jams!
normalised: First up, Doctor Reddy's Automotive unveiled their new electric scooter, the 'Bijli Bullet', boasting a whopping one hundred and fifty kilometer range on a single charge. Talk about escaping Bangalore traffic jams!

unnormalised: Then, Tata Motors finally launched the 'Nexon Max Pro' with a sunroof bigger than my nanaji's courtyard (about 200 sq ft, give or take). Rumours say it comes in 'Masala Red' and 'Turmeric Yellow'. Fancy!
normalised: Then, Tata Motors finally launched the 'Nexon Max Pro' with a sunroof bigger than my nanaji's courtyard (about two hundred square feet, give or take). Rumours say it comes in 'Masala Red' and 'Turmeric Yellow'. Fancy!

unnormalised: But wait, there's more! Mahindra is teasing a revamped Scorpio, promising “zordaar” performance and a cabin packed with tech.
normalised: But wait, there's more! Mahindra is teasing a revamped Scorpio, promising “zordaar” performance and a cabin packed with tech.

unnormalised: Price wars are heating up too. The Bijli Bullet is rumoured to be priced around Rs. 80,000. Will it dethrone the Ola S1? Only time will tell. Keep your eyes peeled for more updates! This Diwali is gonna be lit… with new cars and scooters!
normalised: Price wars are heating up too. The Bijli Bullet is rumoured to be priced around rupee eighty thousand. Will it dethrone the Ola S one? Only time will tell. Keep your eyes peeled for more updates! This Diwali is gonna be lit… with new cars and scooters!
